content.query:
/**/
--create table
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[TABLE2]
(
    Id INT NOT NULL,
    created_time DATETIME NOT NULL
)
--add msg column
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[TABLE2]
    ADD msg varchar(255)

--insert some test data
DECLARE @i int = 1;
DECLARE @alphabet varchar(36) = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789'
WHILE @i <= 500
Begin
DECLARE @stamp datetime = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
DECLARE @msg varchar(36)=
substring(@alphabet, convert(int, rand()*36), 1) +
substring(@alphabet, convert(int, rand()*36), 1) +
substring(@alphabet, convert(int, rand()*36), 1) +
substring(@alphabet, convert(int, rand()*36), 1) +
substring(@alphabet, convert(int, rand()*36), 1);
INSERT INTO [dbo].[TABLE2] VALUES(@i,@stamp,@msg);
SET @i+=1;
END

--select
SELECT * FROM TABLE2 ORDER BY [TABLE2].[Id] 
SELECT Id,msg FROM TABLE2 WHERE Id=10 OR Id=20
SELECT * FROM TABLE2 WHERE Id>=200 ORDER BY Id
SELECT * FROM TABLE2 WHERE Id>=10 AND Id<240 ORDER BY Id
